title: Read and Write bigWig Files.
text: cpp11bigwig provides read access bigWig files R using libBigWig @dpryan79. Data read R data.frame.

title: Read and Write bigWig Files.
code: # Install development version from GitHub # install.packages("pak") pak::pak("rnabioco/cpp11bigwig") library(cpp11bigwig)
